channel.title: Comments on: Introducing Society Discussions
channel.description: Reformed catholic theology in the tradition of Herman and J. H. Bavinck

item.title: By: tim prussic
item.dc:creator: tim prussic
item.description: This is very exciting! I've been reading VanDrunen lately, but he comes from a significantly different perspective than I do. I'm highly influenced by the Reconstructionists and Theonomists, so the 2K stuff socks me sideways pretty often! Thanks for making this available!
item.content:encoded: This is very exciting! I’ve been reading VanDrunen lately, but he comes from a significantly different perspective than I do. I’m highly influenced by the Reconstructionists and Theonomists, so the 2K stuff socks me sideways pretty often! Thanks for making this available!
